projects.name: GeoTrace
projects.description: GeoTrace is a tool that allows users to visualize and analyze traceroute paths by plotting them on a map. Developed using Qt, this application provides an intuitive and user-friendly interface for network diagnostics and troubleshooting. By leveraging geolocation data, GeoTrace brings a geographical context to network analysis, enabling users to easily identify and understand the routes taken by their network traffic.

projects.name: Tetris AI
projects.description: This repository provides a comprehensive evaluation and comparison of different algorithms applied to playing Tetris: Genetic Algorithm, Imitation Learning with Deep Q-Network (DQN), and Natural Selection. Tetris, a popular puzzle game, serves as the testing ground for assessing the performance and effectiveness of each algorithm in achieving high scores and optimal gameplay strategies.

projects.name: Den Lure Vind
projects.description: Webpage and Server running on a Oracle Cloud VM. Serves some functionality for my portefolio. Mostly used for testing new things and hosting content.
